title: How is life now different from 40 years ago? - Quora

response.answer_text: These are the hard facts of Today's Life    40 years ago … … … … … … … … … Everyone wanted to have children. Today many couples are afraid of having children. Children respected their Parents. Nowadays Parents have to respect their Children. Marriage was easy but divorce was not that much easier. Nowadays you find it very difficult to get married but divorce is so easy. We got to know all the neighbors. Nowadays we are strangers to our neighbors Villagers were flocking to the city to find employment. Nowadays the city - breds are fleeing from the city to find peace in villages. Everyone wanted to be fat to look happy. Nowadays everyone diets to look healthy. People pretended to be poor. Now the poor are pretending to be rich. Only the head of the family worked to support the whole family. Now all have to work to support one child. People loved to study and read newspapers magazines books and listen to the radio in their spare time. Nowadays people love to engage themselves to update Facebook and read their WhatsApp messages and most of the time is spent on smart phone. People were after peaceful life quietness and wanted to lead normal life. Nowadays people are after materialistic pleasures and possessions. People were kind sympathetic and supportive. Nowadays people become self centered avaricious and practise greediness egotism and hypocrisy. 40 years was 1980 … … … which seems just like yesterday. Days passed by, months rolled by, seasons went by ,now we are in 2020.
